attributes.action: Scrap the 2035 petrol and diesel car ban
attributes.additional_details:
Scrap the ban and allow sales to
Continue
attributes.background: We do not think that electric vehicles are suitable for the majority. They can be expensive to buy, repair, insure and charge (using public chargers). Modern petrol and diesel cars do not pollute as much as they used to.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition, which calls for a similar action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/704957
